1stPlayer FK 300W Power Supply

1stPlayer FK 300W comes with Double Forward + APFC (4.0 PPFC), EFF. high as 85% under typical loading. This power supply is the Perfect combination of cooling and silent with 12CM Hydraulic, Bearing fan. The powed supply has +12V Loadup To90% Of Total Power, Active PFC, Standby Power Low As 0.5W, Open Circuit Protect.

Explosive Output RTX Gaming Power Supply

The Latest FK series power supply can meet the rigid demand of 20 series GPU for explosive power. NVIDIA Turing GPU architecture and innovative RTX platform provide real-time ray tracing, artificial intelligence, and programmable coloring, the 1stPlayer FK 300W powered supply has capability of instant power, and also it can meet the rigid demand of 20 series GPU for explosive power.

Double Forward + Active PFC+

The structure of FK series power supply decides the main performance like efficiency, temp. With double forward and active PFC, DK 4.0 ensures a supreme performance.

This 1stPlayer FK 300W is capable of +12V Supply Power To CPU, GPU, Cooling Fans Mainstream gaming PC overall power under full load. The latest 1stPlayer power supply has 03 years warranty.

1STPLAYER DK 5.0 PS-500AX 500W 80 PLUS BRONZE Non-Modular ATX Power Supply

The 1STPLAYER DK 5.0 PS-500AX is armed with an 80 PLUS bronze certificate, Japanese TK main capacitors, single +12V rail design, and 1ST optimized rail structure, so as to realize a more powerful performance. It is a perfect combination of cooling and silence with a 12CM Hydraulic Bearing fan. Single +12V output, the output of +12V loading can be rated as 90% of the total power. It complies with ErP LOT 6, Standby power low as 0.5W. DK 5.0 delivers a reliable life expectancy and quality assurance. It has 24PIN*1, P8(4+4)*1, P8(6+2)+P8(6+2)*1, SATA+SATA+SATA+IDE*2 and Black Flat DC Cables. The 1STPLAYER DK 5.0 comes with 3 years of warranty.

full_description:
1STPlayer PS-600AX Bronze Full Modular Power Supply

1STPlayer PS-600AX Bronze Full Modular Power Supply is a 80 PLUS Bronze rated power supply, it has an upgraded performance with more powerful features. The DK 6.0 Full modular power supply gives maximum output capacity of 600W rated power and included with 12CM cooling fan , flat cable and full voltage output. The PS-600AX Power supply works with AC input power of 100-240V, with 47-63Hz frequency and 6.0A Max current capacity. With full range voltage and SCP function, when the power is cut off under abnormal condition. DK 5.0 will activate the power protection function to protect the PSU and motherboard effectively.

Modular design

1STPlayer PS-600AX Bronze Full Modular Power Supply comes with a modular design that can issue cable when upgrading GPU, multiple hard drives and case fans. Also, you can add/remove cable as their demand. Moreover, full modular design delivers a convenient cable management. Users can save space with flat cable that results in a nice-looking back routing. 

Double Forward + Active PFC

Mainly, CPU decides the computing power whether in a smartphone or a PC. In a similar way, the structure of a PSU decides the main performance like efficiency, temp. With double forward and active PFC, DK4.0 ensures a supreme performance.

Power

1ST Player PS-600AX Bronze Full Modular Power Supply has a output voltage of 12V that can be rated over 90% of the total power, reacting the high level of real power. Enthusiastic gamers always pursue an ultimate gaming experience. the powerful and stable output of DK 4.0 ensures the smooth operation. Moreover, 90% of the output efficiency of the single +12V rails can fulfill the power supply requirement towards the Graphics card and overclock as they wish.

full_description:
1STPLAYER AR PS-750AR 750W 80+ Gold Power Supply

The 1STPLAYER AR PS-750AR 750W 80+ Gold Power Supply is a high-performance and efficient power supply for your system. With a continuous power output of 750W and an input current of 10A MAX, this power supply is capable of handling demanding tasks. It features a 120MM Hydraulic Bearing fan for optimal cooling and a remarkable efficiency of 80 PLUS GOLD, reaching 92.4% at typical loading. The ARMOUR series utilizes a mature LLC+DC-DC solution, resulting in up to 90.54% efficiency at typical loading under 110V and 92.3% efficiency under 220V. With a cross loading voltage regulation of less than 2%, this power supply ensures impressive electrical performance and stability. The Individual Smart Start/Stop Switch allows for silent operation and superior cooling performance by monitoring and adjusting the fan speed based on the internal temperature. Upgrade your system with the 1STPLAYER AR PS-750AR 750W 80+ Gold Power Supply for reliable and efficient power delivery.
